name: KOST
description:
Use "NumPad 1(Red), 2(Green) , 3(Blue)" to Slash
Hold "Space" to toggle Stab ON
Hold "Z" to Aim Up








"Parallel universes are threatened.
The mighty Sword of Spacetime is looking for a master accross dimensions
to become the new Keeper of Spacetime."

Perlin's submission to the LOWREZ Jam 2020.
Made with Construct 3 and Bfxr.
All musics by Rolemusic.
